description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hone your flying skills with Game Training Volume 2: Flight. Fly fighter jets and take down enemies to complete achievements in this breathtaking flight simulator.  GT2 is a great “Starter Flight Simulator” for people who are new to the genre and don’t want to purchase a full Flight Sim or for people who just want to casually fly a fighter jet around and shoot stuff.
